sentences.en: She ceded all power to her son-in-law who now runs the country as an autocracy.
sentences.cn: 她把权力全部交给自己的女婿，他现在对国家实行独裁统治。

sentences.en: "My daughter and son-in-law were there," he said.
For this list we've gone for Maradona's son-in-law Sergio Aguero.
sentences.cn: 在这份名单中我们给出的是马拉多纳的女婿塞尔吉奥·阿奎罗。
